Package io.amcp.core

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Agent
    Base interface for all agents in the AMCP system.
    AgentContext
    The runtime environment for agents in the AMCP system.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractAgent
    Abstract base implementation of the Agent interface.
    AgentID
    Unique identifier for an Agent in the AMCP mesh.
    AgentState
    Represents the serializable state of an agent for persistence and migration.
    AgentState.Builder
    Builder for creating AgentState instances.
    AgentStatus
    Represents the current status of an agent in the AMCP system.
    AuthenticationContext
    Authentication context for external service integration.
    AuthenticationContext.Builder  
    ControlEvent
    Represents a control event used for managing agent lifecycle and system operations.
    ControlEvent.Builder
    Builder for creating ControlEvents.
    DefaultAgentContext
    Default implementation of AgentContext that provides agent lifecycle management, messaging capabilities, and resource management.
    DeliveryOptions
    Configuration options for event delivery in the AMCP system.
    DeliveryOptions.Builder
    Builder for creating custom DeliveryOptions.
    Event
    Represents an event in the AMCP system following CloudEvents 1.0 specification.
    Event.Builder
    Builder pattern for creating Events with optional parameters.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AgentLifecycle
    Enumeration of agent lifecycle states in AMCP.
    AuthenticationContext.CredentialType  
    ControlEvent.Command
    Control command types for agent management.
    DeliveryOptions.DeliveryMode
